mapper.select: select LANG_ID as langId, COURSE_IN_EXCLUSION_IDENTI_NO as courseInExclusionIdentiNo, SEQUES_NO as sequesNo, COURSE_IDENTI_NO as courseIdentiNo, IN_EXCLUSION_TYPE as inExclusionType, IN_EXCLUSION as inExclusion, DEL_FLG as delFlg, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(MODIFY_TIME,'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') as modifyTime from COURSE_IN_EXCLUSION

select LANG_ID as langId, COURSE_IN_EXCLUSION_IDENTI_NO as courseInExclusionIdentiNo, SEQUES_NO as sequesNo, COURSE_IDENTI_NO as courseIdentiNo, IN_EXCLUSION_TYPE as inExclusionType, IN_EXCLUSION as inExclusion, DEL_FLG as delFlg, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(MODIFY_TIME,'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') as modifyTime from COURSE_IN_EXCLUSION where LANG_ID =#{langId} and COURSE_IN_EXCLUSION_IDENTI_NO =#{courseInExclusionIdentiNo} and SEQUES_NO =#{sequesNo}
mapper.update: update COURSE_IN_EXCLUSION set LANG_ID= #{langId}, COURSE_IN_EXCLUSION_IDENTI_NO= #{courseInExclusionIdentiNo}, SEQUES_NO= #{sequesNo}, COURSE_IDENTI_NO= #{courseIdentiNo}, IN_EXCLUSION_TYPE= #{inExclusionType}, IN_EXCLUSION= #{inExclusion}, DEL_FLG= #{delFlg}, CREATE_TIME= #{createTime}, MODIFY_TIME= now() where LANG_ID =#{langId} and COURSE_IN_EXCLUSION_IDENTI_NO =#{courseInExclusionIdentiNo} and SEQUES_NO =#{sequesNo}
mapper.insert: insert into COURSE_IN_EXCLUSION( LANG_ID, COURSE_IN_EXCLUSION_IDENTI_NO, SEQUES_NO, COURSE_IDENTI_NO, IN_EXCLUSION_TYPE, IN_EXCLUSION, DEL_FLG, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME )values( #{langId}, #{courseInExclusionIdentiNo}, #{sequesNo}, #{courseIdentiNo}, #{inExclusionType}, #{inExclusion}, #{delFlg}, now() , now() )
